posts.message:
Deconstructing 3 web UI patterns from today’s hottest companies.

It explains the purpose of design patterns, shows 3 examples of them done right by today’s top companies, and explains why your UI needs to go beyond just “technically working”

posts.description: Check out the hottest web UI patterns used by Pinterest, Facebook, Twitter, Kickstarter, AirBnB, Tinder, and more.

posts.message: Hey Guys, Actually iam Graphic Designer but really iam looking forward to know about porgramming...So i ask u to recommend me a good course to watch....or just tell me where to start ?? Really i will appreciate ur suggestions...Thanks :)
Does any one use Ghost CMS? this CMS make a big buzz in blogging community, some people say it will smash Wordpress ?!
any news regarding forming a team, working on the selected ideas !?

i think that Apple Watch will be a huge success despite inheriting the same Apple products syndrome! (high price tag), but iPhone 6 is actually no big deal except being a copy of Koreans Sam or LG.

BTW Apple proves every day that its identity built from two things which they done brilliantly, Industrial Design + Marketing.
